erro_sso: Verify that the user used is the same registered in the system.
verifique_conexao: Check that you have an internet connection or that the Username/Password is correct
recuperar_senha_solicitacao: Recovery request performed, check your email box
recuperar_senha_solicitacao_erro: Failed to request password recovery, check if you entered the e-mail correctly
msg_esqueci_page: Enter your registered email and click on the "Recover Password" button, you will receive a recovery link in your email.
